meanings.sent1: The libertine's libertinage shocked the town with its wildness.
meanings.sent2: His constant libertinage led to his reputation as a troublemaker.
meanings.sent3: The party's libertinage was so extreme that even the neighbors heard about it.
meanings.sent4: Her flirtatious behavior at work was a subtle form of libertinage.
meanings.sent5: The film depicted the dark side of libertinage, showing its consequences.

meanings.definition: The behavior or lifestyle of a libertine
meanings.sent1: In his youth, he embraced the libertine's libertinage without considering the consequences.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy aristocrat's libertinage was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: Despite his libertine ways, he still had a charm that attracted many.
meanings.sent4: Her luxurious lifestyle was a form of elegant libertinage.
meanings.sent5: The novel's protagonist was drawn into a world of opulent libertinage.
